text.en: Homage to the lama!
text.en-trans: namo gurawé

text.en: Outwardly, you are Sarasvatī, the daughter of Brahmā,
text.en-trans: chitar tsangpé bumo yangchenma

text.en: Inwardly, you are the youthful lady Tārā,
text.en-trans: nangtar arya taré mimö zuk

text.en: Secretly, you are the innate Vajravārāhī,
text.en-trans: sangwa lhenkyé benza barahi

text.en: You who embody them all—ḍākinī of the Lakar family—may you reign supreme!
text.en-trans: kündü lakar daki gyal gyur chik

text.en: The great master of Orgyen knows all past, present and future, and with his vajra words
text.en-trans: orgyen dü sum khyenpé dorjé ka

text.en: The revealers of the terma treasures, those universal kings of realization,
text.en-trans: ter jin drubpé khorlö gyur nam kyi

text.en: Have praised you in their predictions, undisputed,
text.en-trans: shelkar dorjé tso yi namtrul du

text.en: As the emanation of Shelkar Dorje Tso1—and so to you I pray!
text.en-trans: tsömé lung gi ngak la solwa deb

text.en: Just as they foretold in their vajra prophecies,
text.en-trans: dorjé lung gi zinpa jizhin du

text.en: You joined Padma Yeshe Dorje,2supreme embodiment of skilful means,
text.en-trans: tab chok pema yeshe dorjé yi

text.en: As the consort symbolizing wisdom and emptiness—
text.en-trans: sherab tongpé chakgyar nyam jorwé

text.en: Lady of great bliss, granter of the four joys, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: dechen ga zhi dakmor solwa deb

text.en: Moved by a devotion so deep that I perceive lama and consort as indivisible,
text.en-trans: lama yabyum yermé mögü kyi

text.en: From the core of my heart I pray: on such a person as me
text.en-trans: nying né solwa debpé gangzak la

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that the bliss-emptiness ofcaṇḍāliis invoked,
text.en-trans: detong tsendali yi gyü kul té

text.en: And the blissful warmth and wisdom are set ablaze!
text.en-trans: dé drö yeshe barwar jin gyi lob

text.en: Through the blessings of such a prayer as this,
text.en-trans: detar solwa tabpé jinlab kyi

text.en: May my mind be turned towards the Dharma,
text.en-trans: lona dampé chö su drowa dang

text.en: May Dharma progress along the path, and, as delusory appearances
text.en-trans: chö yang lam long trulnang yeshe su

text.en: Are purified into wisdom, may I come to master the bodhicitta supreme!
text.en-trans: dak né changchub sem chok jongwar shok

text.en: In this and all my future lives, hold me in your compassion!
text.en-trans: kyé dang tserab küntu tukjé zung

text.en: At all times and in any situation, grant me your blessing, I pray!
text.en-trans: dü dang nampa küntu jingyi lob

text.en: For in this life, the next and in the bardo state,
text.en-trans: dichi bardö nekab tamché du

text.en: O Jetsünma, there is no other source of hope for me but you!
text.en-trans: resa khyé le mé do jetsünma
